Judgment on Cush and Assyria

“\w You|strong="H1571"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Cushites,\f + \fr 2:12 \ft That is, people from the upper Nile region\f* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w by|strong="H1571"\w* \w My|strong="H1571"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.”
